scripts.clear: rm db.sqlite3 && knex migrate:latest && npm start
scripts.postinstall: npm run rebuild-sqlite3 && npm run rebuild-sharp && npm run rebuild-udev && npm run rebuild-libraw
scripts.rebuild-libraw: cd node_modules/node-libraw && node-gyp configure --module_name=node-libraw --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v47-linux-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=0.36.0 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node-libraw --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v47-linux-x64
scripts.rebuild-udev: cd node_modules/udev && node-gyp configure --module_name=udev --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v47-linux-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=0.36.0 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=udev --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v47-linux-x64
scripts.rebuild-sharp: cd node_modules/sharp && node-gyp configure --module_name=sharp --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v47-linux-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=0.36.0 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=sharp --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v47-linux-x64
scripts.rebuild-sqlite3: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && npm run prepublish && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v47-linux-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=0.36.0 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v47-linux-x64
